title: BREAKING NEWS!!! Calling your teammates idiots is now banable. Riot Games is E for everyone.
body:
Game 1
Pre-Game
Ovasmop: jg
In-Game
Ovasmop: why are all you guys so bad a league of legends
Ovasmop: get flamed idiots
Ovasmop: .
Ovasmop: thats w
Ovasmop: HAHAHA GOTEEEM
Ovasmop: good one lee sin
Ovasmop: jhin ur mother will not recognize ur face after this match
Ovasmop: i came to ur lane
Ovasmop: what u gonna do
Ovasmop: yas ur a nibber
Ovasmop: outplayed
Ovasmop: %%%%% chill
Ovasmop: im getting u money
Ovasmop: called taxes
Ovasmop: idgaf
Ovasmop: banned for what?
Ovasmop: get roasted jhin
Ovasmop: just dont die and we win
Ovasmop: top gone bot gone mid gone
Ovasmop: ez
Ovasmop: i didnt have him damage
Ovasmop: learn the game
Ovasmop: you have to damage an enemy to r them idiot
Ovasmop: report this sylas
Ovasmop: flames team and then ints
Ovasmop: take the dragon iditos
Ovasmop: we are ded
Ovasmop: fine ill get it
Ovasmop: lets just go next
Ovasmop: i really dont understand
Ovasmop: what is it you want from me sylas
Ovasmop: i cant stop you from going 5-9
Ovasmop: they dont to play it out
Ovasmop: so prepare to lose idiots
Ovasmop: thats how you do boys
Ovasmop: come in flaming
Ovasmop: gg boys
Ovasmop: well played
Ovasmop: lol
Ovasmop: i dont even wanna know how bad NA joseph feeds if we got the korean one (we had a guy named korean Joseph, quite proud of that one)
Ovasmop: GOTTEEEE
Post-Game
Ovasmop: well we tried out hardest
Ovasmop: toxic pings man
Ovasmop: you know you were being toxic
Ovasmop: dont play it off as the victim
